title: Arcade Fire
summary: Arcade Fire is a Canadian indie rock band, consisting of husband and wife Win Butler and RÃ©gine Chassagne, along with Win's younger brother William Butler, Richard Reed Parry, Tim Kingsbury and Jeremy Gara. The band's current touring line-up also includes former core member Sarah Neufeld, percussionist Tiwill Duprate and saxophonist Stuart Bogie.
